description.en:
The META UNIVERSE is a shooting game, partially owned and operated by its players.
It's a 3D Adventure-Expanding Game with expansion to a VR Experience developed with Unreal Engine.
Also, the METAUNIVERSE is a community driven DeFi Token for the Meta Universe ecosystem. Holders shape the future of the Meta Universe by signaling their support for upgrades to the ecosystem in the Meta Community. 
Moreover, by using METAUNIVERSE, players can purchase items and collectibles usable in game. Also, they can trade in and sell them inside the Meta Universe.
